scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:shell" "npm run start:home" "npm run start:products" "npm run start:cart" "npm run start:checkout" "npm run start:orders"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd shell && npm install && cd ../home && npm install && cd ../product-catalog && npm install && cd ../cart && npm install && cd ../checkout && npm install && cd ../orders && npm install
